summary: This is an email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York Public Affairs office, forwarding a link to a New York Post article. The article discusses criticism of federal agents for damaging Jeffrey Epstein's door during a raid, and mentions that Epstein's sister-in-law was upset about it.

persons.name: Michael Smerconish
persons.context: He is the commentator who called out federal agents for damaging Jeffrey Epstein's door, as reported in the linked New York Post article.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the raid where federal agents damaged his door. The email references an article about this incident.

events.title: NY Post Article on Epstein Door Damage
events.description: The New York Post publishes an article where commentator Michael Smerconish criticizes federal agents for damaging Jeffrey Epstein's door during a raid.

keyFacts: An email from the SDNY Public Affairs office forwards a link to a New York Post article dated July 9, 2019.
The article discusses federal agents damaging Jeffrey Epstein's door during a raid, drawing criticism from commentator Michael Smerconish.
The email mentions that Epstein's sister-in-law was also upset about the door damage, indicating family awareness of the property incident.
